page.title: 16GOTHENLY HALL
page.content: List of owners in last hundred years. 1883......Edward James Stanley. 1894......John Henry Cann. 1910......John Henry Cann. 1923......John Henry Cann. 1931......Col Rodger Hammet. 1935......Unoccuppied. 1939......Edward Simone. 1951......Mr Hallet. Mr Hallet moved into Gothelney Hall in 1953 with his wife and family of 4 girls.In the last 3 families only girls have been born.The only boy is Mr Hallet's grandson which means one day he could own the house.Mr Hallet owns 160 acres of land used for grow - ing corn,barley,potatoes & beans.He keeps 70 female sheep & employs 2 people to work on his land.He owns 3 cottages,1 lived in by worker,other by retired gardener,3rd used for holiday lets.Gothelney dates back to Domesday.
